Fayetteville.Tharp House (Fayetteville, Arkansas): The Tharp House is a historic house at 15 North West Avenue in Fayetteville, Arkansas. It is a 1-1/2 story wood frame house, with Queen Anne styling. Its front facade is three bays wide, with a projecting square gable-roofed section to the right, and the main entrance in the center, sheltered by a porch that wraps around the left side.
